courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of guitar playing, including chords, scales, fingerpicking, and strumming patterns.

courses.title: Advanced Vocal Techniques
courses.description: Develop your vocal range, improve your control, and learn advanced singing techniques.

courses.title: Music Production Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of recording, editing, and mixing music in a digital audio workstation (DAW).

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Explore the world of electronic music creation, learn sound design, synthesis, and beatmaking techniques.

courses.title: Blues Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Learn the essential blues scales, licks, and rhythms to master the soulful sounds of blues guitar.

courses.title: Classical Music Fundamentals
courses.description: Gain a solid foundation in classical music theory, notation, and performance techniques.
